survey_name: Mobile Banking App Customer Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback on customer satisfaction with the features and usability of our mobile banking app to improve user experience.

questions.question_text: How often do you use our mobile banking app?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice scale to measure frequency of app usage.

script.question_text: How often do you use our mobile banking app?

questions.question_text: Which of the following features do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice question to identify popular features.

script.question_text: Which of the following features do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with the overall usability of our mobile banking app? (1 = Very dissatisfied, 5 = Very satisfied)
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure satisfaction.

script.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with the overall usability of our mobile banking app? (1 = Very dissatisfied, 5 = Very satisfied)

questions.question_text: What do you like most about our mobile banking app?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: What do you like most about our mobile banking app?

questions.question_text: What challenges or difficulties have you faced while using our mobile banking app?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to identify pain points.

script.question_text: What challenges or difficulties have you faced while using our mobile banking app?

questions.question_text: How easy is it to navigate through the app?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice scale to measure navigation ease.

script.question_text: How easy is it to navigate through the app?

questions.question_text: How often do you experience technical issues (e.g., crashes, slow loading) with the app?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice scale to measure frequency of technical issues.

script.question_text: How often do you experience technical issues (e.g., crashes, slow loading) with the app?

questions.question_text: Which of the following improvements would you like to see in our mobile banking app? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice question to identify desired improvements.

script.question_text: Which of the following improvements would you like to see in our mobile banking app? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend our mobile banking app to others? (1 = Not at all likely, 10 = Extremely likely)
questions.client_notes: Use a 10-point scale to measure Net Promoter Score (NPS).

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend our mobile banking app to others? (1 = Not at all likely, 10 = Extremely likely)

questions.question_text: Do you have any additional comments or suggestions for improving our mobile banking app?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture final feedback.

script.question_text: Do you have any additional comments or suggestions for improving our mobile banking app?
